overview: The story revolves around a young comedian who tries to find humor in every possible situation, which even pose dangers to her. This is a light-hearted story with a satire on the current situation of the comedy industry in India, and how just trivial thing can trigger the consensus.
tagline: In a society where humor, though perceived differently, does not stop even in grave situations.
title: Acha, Ek Joke Sunau?
